title: Contextualized Learning Program for Developing Digital Literacy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental smartphone proficiency and workplace document preparation experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on digital skills with practical workplace applicability for working professionals. Mobile-optimized content design considering PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform real-time editing and sharing processes using smartphone-based collaborative tools (Google Docs, MS Teams, etc.) for official document preparation.
Learners can select work materials by applying a 3-step credibility checklist for digital information sources: verifying authors, validating sources, and confirming currency.
Learners can produce and share work-related educational content using smartphone video editing apps.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
